column4: hey everyone... how can i convert a CD into mp3's? yes i would militantly defend ogg vorbis, but this is for my mom whose mp3 player doesn't like that format. any ideas?
lame keeps saying that the wave is not in 32 bit format. i'm trying to perform lame on wav files...
actually, the message all mp3 encoders give me is: "<file> is not in 32, 44.1 or 48 kHz!" but i'll try the Grip program thanks
file some.wav, what does the report
